Articles.Content: I always thought of what it would look like if someone made a bunch of battle cruisers and put them in a sort of staging area, like orbiting minmus. A lot of work but worth the pride.
Mine battlecruisers be stock, but be there they be screenshots forthcoming! Huzzah!
My exact thoughts! However that wouldn\'t be possible, as over time they would be scattered from being in slightly different orbits.

I currently am away from my ksp computer, but take the SS-3 replace the second stage with a large space plane that has 2 smaller craft attached, plus larger planes replacing the 3rd and 4th stages for a total of 20 planes deployable on a moments notice, anywhere in the world.

These are all good ideas and I can\'t wait for pics!
Btw they don\'t have to be orbiting minmus it was only a suggestion. My bad.
